subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula used to calculate the Net National Product (NNP) at factor price level?
question_hi: नौकरी मूल्य स्थान/विभाग की समझौते पर नौकरी की नौकरी की मूल्य स्थान आदर्शी
B_en: GNP formula at factor price level
C_en: GNP formula at market price level
D_en: GNP formula at purchasing power parity (PPP) level
explanation_en: The correct answer is D. The formula used to calculate Net National Product (GNP) at purchasing power parity (PPP) level is known as the PPP formula. In this method, the prices of goods and services in different countries are adjusted to a common price level to compare the standard of living between countries.
explanation_hi: विस्तर पूर्वानगर परिणाम की प्रातिशत प्रातिशत प्रातिशत पूर्वानगर प्रातिशत
explanation_en: The formula used to calculate Net National Product (GNP) at purchasing power parity (PPP) level is known as the PPP formula. In this method, the prices of goods and services in different countries are adjusted to a common price level to compare the standard of living between countries.
